indication: Cancer (Multiple Myeloma); Mechanism relevant for Neurodegeneration
known_risks: This is a synthetic benchmark placeholder; integrate real evidence before deployment.
evidence_positive: HDAC6 inhibitors: ricolinostat IC50 variable by cell line, citarinostat IC50 2.6nM (HDAC6); induces α-tubulin acetylation; synergistic with paclitaxel in breast cancer
